org.tigris.noodle
Class NoodleResources

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.tigris.noodle.NoodleResources
public class NoodleResources
extends java.lang.Object

To use this class, call NoodleResources.setBundle() once to set the ResourceBundle. Then, use NoodleResources.getInstance().getBundle() to retrieve the ResourceBundle. I'm not sure if I could do this with just having static references to things so I implemented it as a singleton simply to be safe. Email me if you think this should be done another way.

Author:
Jon S. Stevens
